sentence.Network_en: A major step formed in miniaturization came with the integrated circuit.

sentence.Network_en: Device miniaturization results in reduced unit cost per function and in improved performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 器件微小型化导致每单元功能成本的下降以及性能的改善.

sentence.Network_en: Miniaturization is the development trend of battery electric vehicle ( BEV ).
sentence.Network_cn: 微型纯电动汽车是 电动汽车 的发展趋势之一.

entry.def: If you miniaturize something such as a machine, you produce a very small version of it.

example.ex: ...the problems of further miniaturizing the available technologies.
example.tran: 进一步实现现有技术微型化的问题

means.word_mean: 1. act of making on a greatly reduced scale

auth_sentence.content: First, the vehicle would have to have a very small cross section and rely heavily on nanotechnology for miniaturization.
